column3: I thought we were gonna go with not displaying the replaced_by_txid transactions ala TransactionRecord::showTransaction?

These are strictly improvements, utACK 6d7104c.\nAgree that hiding the transactions might also be a good idea, but you're the one implementing it (as I remember, hiding transactions is more difficult to get right). Further ideas could always be done later.

This seems to have broken  qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt:
